record.title: 10,000 TEACHERS, 10 MILLION MINDS SCIENCE AND MATH SCHOLARSHIP ACT

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, pursuant to the instructions of the House on the motion to recommit, I report the bill, H.R. 362, back to the House with an amendment.

record.chair: The Clerk will report the amendment.
The question is on the amendment.

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

record.narrative: The yeas and nays were ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on rollcall No. 254, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
